text: em tumor is a disease in which abnormal cells form in the tissues of the brain and/or spinal cord.    - A tumor that starts in another part of the body and spreads to the brain is called a metastatic brain tumor.    - The brain controls many important body functions.     - The spinal cord connects the brain to nerves in most parts of the body.    - There are different types of brain and spinal cord tumors.          - Astrocytic Tumors     - Oligodendroglial Tumors     - Mixed Gliomas     - Epend
